title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Trump ought to be high-fiving over these SCOTUS rulings, 'cause he won't have to release his tax returns to anyone maybe ever, certainly not before November, which is the point of this political witch hunt. The president is not going to stop tweeting, especially with COVID-19. He won the presidency by tweeting to outflank a biased media. Why the Call Screener says, "Get straight to your point." Ivy League to close down all sports -- even for women! Caller asks Rush why he keeps up the fight.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Democrats are doing all they can to stall the economy, tank the market on misreporting of the SCOTUS rulings. First public beta of iOS 14 is here from Apple. Salena Zito with a great piece on how seniors (not the youth, not this or that minority group) will decide 2020. Joe Biden's leaning on tricks when his mind goes blank. COVID is helping Biden hide. Liberal pajama boy TA at UT threatens to rape pro-Trump media personality, Ashley StClair. Trump didn't need any of this, and yet he's still in the fight, even against a sizable chunk of his own party. The Roberts court has been quietly upholding religious liberty. U.S. Navy vet wins Mahindra tractor giveaway.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

A piece on The Offended backs up what Rush has been saying about those who've appeased them for 30 years on this show. Black Lives Matter isn’t a civil rights organization, they're a Marxist front group. Idiot NYC mayor, amid citywide disaster, shuts down for BLM mural at Trump Tower. DNC platform proposes flooding the U.S. with migrants. Seattle councilwoman threatens Bezos, vows to replace capitalism with socialism. Vocal dad refuses to cave to indoctrinated daughter's left-wing garbage.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
